translation.it: Dice: "La prima cosa che voglio

translation.en: She was not only my daughter, but my friend.

translation.en: She was a picky person. Feisty. Full of energy and life.

translation.en: She loved life.

translation.en: She was a good girl with a lot of morals.

translation.en: So she lived here exactly two months.

translation.en: I have specific memories about Debbie.

translation.en: I did go to her apartment a couple of times.

translation.en: There were still stuffed animals on the bed.

translation.en: I mean, it looked like just a bigger version of, you know, a teenager's room.

translation.en: I was just so amazed by that.
translation.it: E la cosa mi colpiva.

translation.en: Debbie was very independent.
translation.it: Debbie era molto indipendente.

translation.en: She wanted to do her own thing,
translation.it: Voleva fare a modo suo GLENNA JONES MADRE DI CHRISTY

translation.en: and, you know, have things on her terms.

translation.en: When she, um...
translation.it: Quando...

translation.en: She had her own apartment.

translation.en: She wanted to have her-- [stammers] a job, a career.

translation.en: She wanted to be on her own, make her own money.

translation.it: e la stavo tormentando perché mi portasse a fare un giro dell'isolato sui pattini.

translation.it: e la stavo tormentando perché mi portasse a fare un giro dell'isolato sui pattini. E alla fine la sfinii a tal punto

translation.en: she was actually-- lived a couple of blocks from my house, where my mom and I lived.

translation.en: 'cause nothing like that had happened here before.

translation.en: of our family.
translation.it: della nostra famiglia.

translation.en: Debbie's dad's name was Charlie and my Aunt Peggy, we call her Peppy.

translation.en: [Christy] Peppy likes to say that she's the reason that we're all here in Ada.

translation.en: Because Peppy had come over here when she married Charlie.
translation.it: perché lei si era trasferita quando aveva sposato Charlie.

translation.en: And everybody kind of followed.

translation.en: [Peppy] Since '59...
I married her daddy in '59.
translation.it: Ho sposato suo padre nel '59.

translation.en: I had her oldest sister in, uh, '60.
translation.it: Ho avuto sua sorella maggiore nel '60.

translation.en: A year later, I had Debbie, in '61.
translation.it: Un anno dopo ho avuto Debbie, nel '61.

translation.en: Then I had my third daughter, in '63.
translation.it: E poi ho avuto la mia terza figlia nel '63.

translation.en: I got the three daughters.

translation.en: See, I'd had this...
translation.it: Avevo avuto...

translation.en: bad, weird feeling, and I told Debbie about it.
translation.it: uno brutto presentimento, e lo avevo detto a Debbie.

translation.en: She said, "Mama, you're so silly. Don't be like that."
translation.it: Le mi aveva risposto: "Mamma, non essere sciocca".

translation.en: But I did.
translation.it: Ma ce l'avevo avuto.

translation.en: I remember that feeling, it was awful.
translation.it: Ricordo quella senzazione, tremenda.

translation.en: That morning, I know I was changing the sheets on my bed.
translation.it: Quella mattina stavo cambiando le lenzuola.

translation.en: And right after I talked to my sister...
translation.it: E subito dopo aver parlato con mia sorella...

translation.it: tornai in camera e cominciai a mettere le lenzuola pulite quando il telefono squillò ancora.

translation.en: and the phone rung again.
translation.it: quando il telefono squillò ancora.

translation.en: [Peppy] So I picked it up. "Hello?"
translation.it: Andai a rispondere ."Pronto?"

translation.en: And it's not my little sister.

translation.en: It's Debbie's friend.

translation.en: And she saw Debbie's car at home.
translation.it: Aveva visto la macchina di Debbie a casa sua

translation.en: And she said, as she started up the stairs,
translation.it: e mentre saliva le scale

translation.en: she heard this loud... music.
translation.it: aveva sentito della musica a tutto volume.

translation.en: And then she said, when she got to the porch, "There's all this glass."
translation.it: E disse che la veranda era coperta di vetri rotti.

translation.en: [Christy] Debbie's friend had found her... and called my aunt.
translation.it: L'amica di Debbie' l'aveva trovata e aveva chiamato mia zia.

translation.en: She was very panicked and told Peppy that,
translation.it: Era nel panico più totale e disse a Peppy

translation.en: you know, Debbie was laying on the floor and that,
translation.it: che Debbie era riversa a terra

translation.en: you know, there was blood.

translation.en: ...her car won't start.

translation.en: Probably by the grace of God.

translation.en: [Peppy] I call Christy's mother, Glenna.
translation.it: Chiamai la mamma di Christy, Glenna.

translation.en: -There's no answer. -[phone ringing]
translation.it: Ma non mi rispose.

translation.en: I call Debbie's phone, there's no answer.
translation.it: Chiamai Debbie, ma non mi rispose.

translation.en: I'm going crazy. I don't know what to do.
translation.it: Stavo impazzendo, non sapevo cosa fare.

translation.en: I'm in there, in my dining room,
translation.it: Me ne stavo lì in sala da pranzo

translation.en: talking to Debbie, talking to that picture.
translation.it: e parlavo con Debbie, con la sua fotografia.

translation.en: "Honey, you're going to be okay.
translation.it: "Tesoro, andrà tutto bene.

translation.en: Mom will be there just as soon as I can get there."
translation.it: La mamma arriva appena riesce ad arrivare".

translation.en: I started walking up the hill there.
translation.it: Cominciai a camminare su per la collina,

translation.en: Well, I seen my best friend's car.
translation.it: quando vidi l'auto della mia migliore amica.

translation.en: She had my sister in there. Glenna, Christy's mother.
translation.it: Con lei c'era mia sorella. Glenna, la madre di Christy.

translation.en: [Glenna] I remember, she saw me sitting in a car...
translation.it: Ricordo che mi vide seduta in macchina...

translation.en: And...
I never said a word, she just knew.
translation.it: Non dissi una parola. Capì tutto.

translation.en: [Peppy] I don't know what happened to me. I just... I couldn't help it.
translation.it: Non so cosa mi prese, ma non potevo farne a meno.

translation.en: I'm a-balling and a-squalling, and just having a fit.
translation.it: Non riuscivo a stare ferma, ebbi una crisi fortissima.

translation.en: I guess, when I did believe it, that night about 7:30.
translation.it: Quando mi resi conto davvero fu verso le 19:30,

translation.en: This detective come by that...
translation.it: quando venne questo detective

translation.en: I know he leaned down and he kept patting me on my knee.
translation.it: che stava chinato su di me e mi picchiettava sul ginocchio.

translation.en: And he kept saying,
translation.it: E mi diceva:

translation.en: "Peggy, it happened. It happened to Debbie."
translation.it: "Peggy, è successo. È successo a Debbie."

translation.en: And I just sit there and cry.
translation.it: Io non facevo che piangere.

translation.en: I just sit in that chair and cry.
translation.it: Stavo lì seduta e piangevo.

translation.en: I don't know what to do.
translation.it: Non sapevo cosa fare.

translation.en: My girl-- My daughter's gone.
translation.it: La mia bambina non c'era più.

translation.en: I just kept looking at him and he kept telling me,
translation.it: Lo guardavo e lui mi ripeteva:

translation.en: "Peggy, it happened, and it happened to Debbie.
translation.it: "Peggy, è successo. Ed è successo a Debbie.

translation.en: It happened to you and Debbie."
translation.it: È successo a te e Debbie."

translation.en: [Dan] I first heard about this case from a lawyer friend of mine in 2000.
translation.it: Sentii parlare di questo caso da un mio amico avvocato nel 2000.

translation.en: And, uh, almost immediately, we were surprised at the way this case was handled.
translation.it: E da subito restammo sorpresi da come era stato gestito.

translation.en: Ada Police, Dennis Smith, was one of the first investigators on the scene.
translation.it: I DETECTIVE Dennis Smith, polizia di Ada, fu uno dei primi ad arrivare sulla scena.

translation.en: They had a, uh... patrolman answer and he called in Dennis Smith.
translation.it: L'agente di pattuglia aveva chiamato Dennis Smith.

translation.en: [Judge Landrith] Uh, Dennis Smith was the... senior detective for the Ada Police Department.
translation.it: Dennis Smith era il detective più anziano del Dipartimento di Polizia di Ada.

translation.en: His reputation, as far as being a good officer,
translation.it: La sua reputazione, oltre a essere un buon ufficiale

translation.en: was impeccable.
translation.it: era impeccabile.

translation.en: But he was normally in charge of whatever...
translation.it: Normalmente era lui che si occupava

translation.en: big case was happening.
translation.it: di tutti i casi più grossi.

translation.en: [Dan] Most people seemed to like him. He was a pretty friendly guy.
translation.it: Piaceva a tutti. Era un tipo molto socievole.

translation.en: And, as a matter of fact, his daughter went to school with Debbie Carter and they were friends.
translation.it: Sua figlia andava a scuola con Debbie Carter, erano amiche.

translation.en: So, he had a personal connection there.
translation.it: Quindi c'era un coinvolgimento personale.

translation.en: The crime scene was a total mess.
translation.it: La scena del crimine era un vero caos.

translation.en: Debbie's body was lying naked on the floor,
translation.it: Il cadavere nudo era riverso sul pavimento

translation.en: except she had a cord wrapped around her neck.
translation.it: con un cavo intorno al collo.

translation.en: She had "Duke Graham" written on her back
translation.it: Sulla schiena aveva la scritta "Duke Graham"

translation.en: and "die" on her chest.
translation.it: e sul petto "muori".

translation.en: On the walls was written,
translation.it: Sui muri c'era scritto:

translation.en: "Jim Smith next will die."
translation.it: "Il prossimo a morire sarà Jim Smith"

translation.en: And on the kitchen table was written,
translation.it: Sul tavolo di cucina c'era scritto:

translation.en: "Don't look fore us or ealse."
translation.it: "Non cercateci, altrimenti"

translation.en: And "for" and "else" were both misspelled.
translation.it: Con due errori di ortografia.

translation.en: There was a palm print on the wall.
translation.it: Sul muro c'era un impronta di un palmo.

translation.en: And, before she was killed,
translation.it: E prima di ucciderla

translation.en: someone had raped Debbie Carter.
translation.it: qualcuno aveva violentato Debbie Carter.

translation.en: And evidently, it was like Grand Central Station over there,
translation.it: E ovviamente sembrava di essere alla Stazione Centrale

translation.en: as far as police officers or a crime scene.
translation.it: dal numero di poliziotti sulla scena.

translation.en: [Dan] Jim Smith and Duke Graham, both of them had alibis, and...
translation.it: Jim Smith e Duke Graham, avevano entrambi un alibi

translation.en: well, neither one of them gave statements that, that fit anything.
translation.it: e nessuno dei due fece dichiarazioni pertinenti con nulla.

translation.en: And they just didn't have anything on either one of them.
translation.it: Non avevano nulla su nessuno dei due.

translation.en: Dennis Smith came in and immediately saw that he would need some help,
translation.it: Arrivò Dennis Smith, ma aveva bisogno di aiuto

translation.en: so he called the Oklahoma State Bureau of Investigation.
translation.it: e chiamò l'Oklahoma State Bureau of Investigation

translation.en: To help him with the crime scene.
translation.it: perché gli desse una mano con la scena.

translation.en: Gary Rogers, he was the OSBI agent,
translation.it: Gary Rogers era l'gente dell'OSBI,

translation.en: which is Oklahoma State Bureau of Investigation.
translation.it: ovvero l'Oklahoma State Bureau of Investigation.

translation.en: Gary had been a former, uh, police officer in Shawnee.
translation.it: Gary era stato agente di polizia a Shawnee.

translation.en: He was a rancher.
translation.it: Aveva un ranch.

translation.en: And always wore a hat and boots,
translation.it: Portava sempre cappello, stivali

translation.en: and jeans, and belt with a coat and tie.
translation.it: jeans, cintura a sopra giacca e cravatta.

translation.en: [Dan] Dennis and Gary basically worked the crime scene.
translation.it: Dennis and Gary si occuparono della scena del crimine.

translation.en: They would funnel their reports to Bill Peterson, who was the prosecutor of the case.
translation.it: Inoltravano i rapporti a Bill Peterson, il procuratore che si occupava del caso.

translation.en: I've known Bill Peterson for all my life.
translation.it: Conosco Bill Peterson da sempre.

translation.en: He, uh, went to Ada High School.
translation.it: Ha frequentato il liceo di Ada,

translation.en: Um, he went to University of Oklahoma.
translation.it: l'Università dell'Oklahoma,

translation.en: He did go through some prep schools back East.
translation.it: e una serie di scuole private a Est.

translation.en: His father was a doctor
translation.it: Il padre era medico

translation.en: and his mother was a, a member of the Norris family.
translation.it: e la madre era un membro della famiglia North.

translation.en: I would say Bill was more of a folksy-type DA,
translation.it: Lo definirei un procuratore abbastanza genuino,

translation.en: where he would, uh, tell stories.
translation.it: uno che racconta storie.

translation.en: Which is a very effective way. When picking a jury
translation.it: Cosa abbastanza efficace quando si sceglie una giuria,

translation.en: is to be somewhat folksy and tell stories.
translation.it: essere genuino e raccontare storie.

translation.en: He could get angry. [sighs]
translation.it: Abbastanza irascibile.

translation.en: I think we all feel the pressure to do what's right.
translation.it: Tutti vogliamo fare la cosa giusta.

translation.en: And I know, since my nephew is a prosecutor,
translation.it: E lo so, perché mio nipote è un procuratore,

translation.en: they have that kind of police mentality.
translation.it: e hanno questa mentalità da poliziotto.

translation.en: They're prosecutors for a reason.
translation.it: Sono procuratori per un motivo.

translation.en: You're not going to make a lot of money in your life being a prosecutor.
translation.it: Non diventi ricco a fare il procuratore.

translation.en: You like to put...
translation.it: Lo fai perché ti piace...

translation.en: bad people in jail.
translation.it: ...arrestare i cattivi.

translation.en: And protect your constituents. I believe that.
translation.it: E proteggere il prossimo. Io ci credo.

translation.en: Somebody took some time to really stage that crime scene.
translation.it: NESSUN SOSPETTATO PER L'OMICIDIO DELLA DONNA Qualcuno si era preso del tempo per organizzare la scena del crimine.

translation.en: You know, most people panic and they leave,
translation.it: Di solito vanno nel panico e scappano

translation.en: and they leave all kinds of stuff. This...
translation.it: e lasciano in giro di tutto. Qui...

translation.en: Whoever did this was really thinking about trying to create a diversion.
translation.it: Chiunque lo abbia fatto era davvero intenzionato a creare un diversivo.

translation.en: Dennis Smith had made a comment that before he retired...
translation.it: Dennis Smith aveva dichiarato che prima di andare in pensione

translation.en: that he would...
translation.it: avrebbe...

translation.en: solve Debbie's case.
translation.it: ...risolto il caso di Debbie.

translation.en: When something like this happens to...
translation.it: Quando succedono queste cose

translation.en: your family or to the town, you know, it's the ripple effect.
translation.it: alla tua famiglia o nella tua cittadina, parte l'effetto domino.

translation.en: I always like to say that it's like a tsunami.
translation.it: MI piace definirlo una specie di tsunami.

translation.en: You know, you don't even recognize that it was coming.
translation.it: Non fai in tempo ad accorgerti che arriva

translation.en: It just takes everything away.
translation.it: che sta già spazzando via tutto.

translation.en: [Dawn] That was a huge shock.
translation.it: Fu uno shock enorme.

translation.en: You think, "Who was it? Somebody in this community?"
translation.it: Pensi: "Chi è stato? È della nostra comunità?"

translation.en: [Grisham] I'm sure it was, um...
translation.it: Sono certo che fu...

translation.en: you know, terrifying in a small town like that.
translation.it: ...agghiacciante, per la cittadina.

translation.en: And then, um...
translation.it: E poi... JOHN GRISHAM SCRITTORE

translation.en: two or three years later, Denice Haraway disappeared.
translation.it: ...due o tre anni dopo Denice Haraway scomparve.

translation.en: ♪ Sweet dreams of you ♪
translation.it: 28 APRILE 1984

translation.en: [woman] Denice worked at the little Quick Stop out on Highway One.
translation.it: Denice lavorava al Quick Stop sulla Highway One.

translation.en: We were very concerned because Denice had disappeared,
translation.it: Eravamo davvero preoccupati, perché Denice era scomparsa

translation.en: and so the word spread quickly.
translation.it: e la voce si era sparsa rapidamente.

translation.en: By the way, Denice worked for me for, um, a semester.
translation.it: Tra l'altro Denice aveva lavorato per me un semestre. BILLIE JEAN FLOYD DIRETTRICE ADA HISTORICAL SOCIETY

translation.en: Part of a semester.
translation.it: Parte di un semestre.

translation.en: A real, sweet little girl,
translation.it: Una ragazza davvero dolce,

translation.en: and she worked for me when she was in school, at East Central.
translation.it: aveva lavorato per me mentre studiava alla East Central.

translation.en: She was working as a work-study student.
translation.it: Faceva la studentessa lavoratrice,

translation.en: Just as sweet as could be. Nice.
translation.it: ed era davvero dolcissima, carina.

translation.en: Just a pretty little girl, you know, that was in college
translation.it: Una bella ragazzina del college

translation.en: and needed a job.
translation.it: a cui serviva un lavoro.

translation.en: And I had an opening for a work-study student
translation.it: Io avevo un posto da studente lavoratore

translation.en: to be my secretary.
translation.it: a farmi da segretario.

translation.en: The town was in disbelief, you know, at what had happened.
translation.it: Tutta la città era attonita. Non credevamo a quello che era successo.

translation.en: They would search out by Lawrence and out southwest of town.
translation.it: La cercarono fino a Lawrence e a sudovest della città.

translation.en: And there was all kinds of strange stories going around where they were looking.
translation.it: Si sentivano storie strane di tutti i tipi sui luoghi della ricerca,

translation.en: Because, apparently, there was no rhyme or reason.
translation.it: perché apparentemente non c'era una spiegazione logica.

translation.en: I don't know what was happening. I just know that there were many rumors
translation.it: Non so cosa stesse succedendo, ma so che di voci ne correvano tante

translation.en: about where she might be.
translation.it: su dove potesse essere.

translation.en: [Dan] On April 28th, 1984,
translation.it: Il 28 aprile 1984,

translation.en: at about 8:30 at night, Denice Haraway was working in the, uh...
translation.it: alle 20:30 circa, Denice Haraway lavorava

translation.en: a little convenience store on the east side of Ada, Oklahoma,
translation.it: nel minimarket dell'East Side di Ada, in Oklahoma.

translation.en: when Gene Whelchel and his two nephews were getting ready to go to a card game.
translation.it: Gene Whelchel e i suoi due nipoti stavano andando a giocare a carte

translation.en: And they stopped by the convenience store
translation.it: e si fermarono al minimarket

translation.en: to get some cigarettes and some change.
translation.it: a comprare le sigarette e cambiare i soldi.

translation.en: They saw a man and a woman walk out
translation.it: Videro un uomo e una donna che uscivano,

translation.en: and get into the passenger side of a pickup and drive off.
translation.it: salivano dal lato passeggero di un pickup e partivano.

translation.en: So we stopped at, uh... McAnally's to get change for the poker game.
translation.it: Ci fermammo da McAnally's a cambiare i soldi per il poker.

translation.en: And I waited in the pickup.
translation.it: Io aspettavo nel pickup,

translation.en: My nephew went inside, Lenny.
translation.it: mentre mio nipote Lenny entrava.

translation.en: And he came back out in a little bit and said there wasn't anybody in there.
translation.it: Dopo un po' uscì e disse che dentro non c'era nessuno.

translation.en: We went in and kinda looked the place over. Discovered that--
translation.it: Entrammo, guardammo ovunque e scoprimmo...

translation.en: Figured that something was wrong. So we called the police.
translation.it: Ci immaginammo che qualcosa non andasse, e chiamammo la polizia.

translation.en: [Dan] Money was taken out of their drawer.
translation.it: Dal cassetto mancavano dei soldi.

translation.en: Whoever was there made a quick grab for the money and obviously took the girl.
translation.it: Chiunque sia stato ha presto quando poteva e portato via la ragazza.

translation.en: Gene: I know it was her that left as we pulled up.
translation.it: So che era lei che se ne stava andando.

translation.en: [Dan] They put an APB out for a faded, light blue pickup truck
translation.it: Fu emesso un ordine di ricerca per un pickup azzurro scolorito

translation.en: with a straight bed, with gray primer spots on it.
translation.it: col cassone diritto, e macchie di primer grigio.

translation.en: And they, uh, stopped a number of people, and developed information,
translation.it: Fermarono un po' di persone, raccolsero informazioni,

translation.en: but they didn't find the girl with any of that.
translation.it: nessuna utile a ritrovare la ragazza.

translation.en: Then, later on that night,
translation.it: Più tardi, quella notte,

translation.en: they went to a store just down the street.
translation.it: andarono in un negozio più avanti

translation.en: And the, uh, clerk there, her name is Karen Wise.
translation.it: e parlarono con la commessa,  Karen Wise.

translation.en: She then reported that she saw a couple of people
translation.it: Raccontò di aver visto delle persone

translation.en: that she felt were suspicious and she was worried about.
translation.it: che sembravano sospette, e si era preoccupata.

translation.en: They kind of scared her. They went into her store
translation.it: L'avevano fatta impaurire entrando nel negozio

translation.en: just a few hours earlier.
translation.it: qualche ora prima.

translation.en: She is also the one that gave a composite sketch
translation.it: Fu lei a fornire un identikit dettagliato

translation.en: of the two guys that she thought was in her store that night.
translation.it: dei due tizi che entrarono nel suo negozio quella sera.

translation.en: They showed it to Gene Whelchel and he said that he thinks
translation.it: Li mostrarono a Gene Whelchel che disse

translation.en: that looks sort of like the guy that they saw.
translation.it: che assomigliava al tizio che aveva visto lui.

translation.en: Pretty soon, they published that composite
translation.it: Ben presto il suo identikit

translation.en: that she had made in the Ada newspaper.
translation.it: fu pubblicato sul quotidiano di Ada.

translation.en: People started calling in. "I know a guy that looks like this.
translation.it: La gente cominciò a chiamare: "Conosco uno che gli somiglia".

translation.en: I know a guy." And all these names started pouring in.
translation.it: "Io lo conosco". E cominciarono a fioccare nomi.

translation.en: A guy by the name of Billy Charley was identified.
translation.it: Venne identificato un ragazzo di nome Billy Charley.

translation.en: Billy Charley had an alibi. He was home with his parents that night.
translation.it: Billy Charley aveva un alibi. Era a casa coi genitori quella sera.

translation.en: And then they started getting quite a few calls about Tommy Ward.
translation.it: Poi iniziarono a ricevere  più di una chiamata su un certo Tommy Ward.

translation.en: Man 1: Okay, Tommy, I've got a few things I need to say first.
translation.it: 18 OTTOBRE 1984 INTERROGATORIO A TOMMY WARD Ok, Tommy, prima di tutto devo dirti un paio di cose.

translation.en: The date today is October 18th, 1984.
translation.it: Oggi è il 18 ottobre 1984.

translation.en: We're at the headquarters office
translation.it: Siamo alla sede centrale

translation.en: of the Oklahoma State Bureau of Investigation located in Oklahoma City.
translation.it: dell' Oklahoma State Bureau of Investigation, a Oklahoma City.

translation.en: I'm Deputy Inspector Rusty Featherstone.
translation.it: Sono il vice-ispettore Rusty Featherstone.

translation.en: Present also in the room, is Special Agent Gary Rogers of the OSBI. Out of the Ada office.
translation.it: Presenti l'agente speciale Gary Rogers dell'OSBI, ufficio di Ada,

translation.en: Captain Dennis Smith of the Ada Police Department, Detective Division.
translation.it: e il capitano Dennis Smith Polizia di Ada, divisione detective.

translation.en: I know we've already talked about it a little bit,
translation.it: So che ne hai già parlato un po' ma adesso vorrei

translation.en: but what I'd like you to do at this point, is just start on that afternoon,
translation.it: So che ne hai già parlato un po' ma adesso vorrei che partissi da quel pomeriggio

translation.en: and just in your own words, at your own speed,
translation.it: e con parole tue, alla velocità che vuoi

translation.en: I want you to go step by step through everything that happened
translation.it: ci raccontassi passo per passo tutto quello che è successo

translation.en: through the rest of that evening, involving this girl.
translation.it: quella sera, con quella ragazza.

translation.en: -Okay? -Okay.
translation.it: - Ok? - Ok.

translation.en: Featherstone: Just go ahead and begin.
translation.it: Vai, inizia.

translation.en: My name is Johnny Lee Daniels.
translation.it: Mi chiamo Johnny Lee Daniels.

translation.en: I've known Tommy Ward...
translation.it: Conosco Tommy Ward... JOHNNY LEE DANIELS AMICO DI TOMMY WARD

translation.en: since we were childhood kids.
translation.it: ...da quando eravamo bambini.

translation.en: Boy, we did a whole lot of running around on the back roads
translation.it: Accidenti se ne abbiamo fatte di scorribande nelle vie secondarie,

translation.en: and drinking back in the day when we was young and didn't have no sense.
translation.it: e se abbiamo bevuto quando eravamo giovani e scapestrati.

translation.en: He was just, um...
translation.it: Era una persona...

translation.en: a pretty quiet person in general.
translation.it: in generale tranquilla.

translation.en: Can you tell me what her blouse looked like, that she was wearing?
translation.it: Puoi dirmi che camicetta indossava?

translation.en: It was...
translation.it: Era...

translation.en: It was...
translation.it: Era...

translation.en: white with little blue...
translation.it: bianca con delle roselline...

translation.en: uh, roses on it.
translation.it: blu.

translation.en: White with blue roses.
translation.it: Bianca a roselline blu.

translation.en: [lady] At that point in time, you're kinda seen the downfall.
translation.it: In quel periodo si iniziava a vedere il tracollo.

translation.en: I didn't know if I was going to see him when he wasn't...
translation.it: Non sapevo se lo avrei rivisto... TRICIA WOLF SORELLA DI TOMMY WARD

translation.en: on some kind of drugs or alcohol.
translation.it: ...senza che fosse fatto o ubriaco.

translation.en: He was a total different person.
translation.it: Era una persona completamente diversa.

translation.en: [man] Tommy had his run-in with the police.
translation.it: Tommy aveva i suoi guai con la polizia.

translation.en: They looked at Tommy as a ruffian.
translation.it: Lo consideravano un criminale.

translation.en: A lower class person.
translation.it: Una persona di bassa levatura.

translation.en: And the police didn't like him for some reason.
translation.it: COGNATO DI TOMMY Alla polizia non piaceva, per qualche motivo.

translation.en: I have no idea why.
translation.it: Non ho idea del perché.

translation.en: Unless it was just those things, you know? I mean, Tommy liked to drink.
translation.it: A meno che non fosse per le solite cose. A Tommy piaceva bere.

translation.en: I... I was at a... keg party.
translation.it: Ero a un... festino a base di birra.

translation.en: And I ran into a couple of guys.
translation.it: C'erano un paio di tizi

translation.en: Asked me if I wanted to go riding around with them and go get high,
translation.it: che mi chiesero se volevo andare a fare un giro, farsi un po',

translation.en: and drink some beer. And I told 'em, "Sure."
translation.it: e bere birra. E io risposi: "Certo".

translation.en: My name is Robert Mayer.
translation.it: Mi chiamo Robert Mayer.

translation.en: I'm originally from New York City.
translation.it: Sono originario di New York.

translation.en: When I graduated from college and journalism school,
translation.it: Quando mi sono laureato alla Scuola di Giornalismo

translation.en: I became a reporter.
translation.it: sono diventato reporter.

translation.en: I had...
translation.it: Non avevo...

translation.en: no conception whatever, if these guys were guilty or innocent.
translation.it: la più pallida idea se questi ragazzi fossero colpevoli o innocenti.

translation.en: I thought, "Well, I'll look into it and see how far it goes."
translation.it: Decisi di indagare e vedere dove sarei arrivato.

translation.en: And so that's how I got into the book that later became The Dreams of Ada.
translation.it: Ed è così che è nata l'idea del libro che poi è diventato The Dreams of Ada.

translation.en: And the confession of, "Was anybody else there?"
translation.it: Nella confessione, al "C'era qualcun altro?",

translation.en: "Yeah, well, the ringleader, the guy who's idea it was,
translation.it: sembra che il capo, la mente del gruppo,

translation.en: was Odell Titsworth."
translation.it: fosse Odell Titsworth.

translation.en: [Robert] And Odell Titsworth was this Indian fellow
translation.it: Odell Titsworth era un indiano

translation.en: who uh, was known, had a reputation among the cops as a bad dude.
translation.it: già noto alle forze dell'ordine come uno da tenere d'occhio.

translation.en: Titsworth, he grabbed money out of the register,
translation.it: Titsworth prese i soldi dalla cassa,

translation.en: and we went out to the pickup.
translation.it: e andammo verso il pickup.

translation.en: Featherstone: Where did you go from there?
translation.it: Da lì dove siete andati?

translation.en: Out to the power plant.
translation.it: Alla centrale elettrica.

translation.en: Featherstone: What did he say he was gonna do with her?
translation.it: Cosa disse che le avrebbe fatto?

translation.en: He told me that he was going to kill her.
translation.it: Mi disse che l'avrebbe uccisa.

translation.en: Now, the other person he had mentioned was... Carl Fontenot.
translation.it: L'altra persona che nominò fu Karl Fontenot.

translation.en: Featherstone: What was the purpose of taking her with you?
translation.it: Qual era lo scopo di portarla con voi?

translation.en: From the store?
translation.it: Di rapirla?

translation.en: To keep from her... coming to y'all and letting y'all know.
translation.it: Evitare che venisse da voi e spifferasse tutto.

translation.en: I mean, was that the plan, though, whenever you went there?
translation.it: Era quello il piano quando siete arrivati?

translation.en: -Yes. -Okay.
translation.it: - Sì. - Ok.

translation.en: We had it all planned out, you know, to...
translation.it: Avevamo pianificato tutto per...

translation.en: What were you planning on doing with her after you got her?
translation.it: Che cosa volevate farle dopo averla rapita?

translation.en: -Raping her. -Raping her and
translation.it: - Violentarla. - E poi ucciderla?

translation.en: -then killing her and getting rid of her? -Yes.
translation.it: Sì.

translation.en: [Johnny] Karl Fontenot I've known Karl Fontenot since we were little kids.
translation.it: Conosco Karl Fontenot da quando eravamo bambini.

translation.en: Karl... was a little slow when it come to his thinking.
translation.it: Karl... era un po' lento nei ragionamenti.

translation.en: As we was going to McAnally's, we stopped there at the apartments,
translation.it: Mentre andavamo da McAnally's, ci fermammo agli appartamenti

translation.en: and decided to smoke some pot and get high and everything.
translation.it: e decidemmo di fumare un po' per essere un po' fatti.

translation.en: We drank some.
translation.it: Bevemmo anche.

translation.en: Then when we got-- We planned it out before we got there.
translation.it: Pianificammo tutto in anticipo.

translation.en: And then, when we got there...
translation.it: Poi , quando arrivammo lì...

translation.en: set it up for us and everything.
translation.it: organizzò tutto.

translation.en: He took her out of the store.
translation.it: La fece uscire dal negozio,

translation.en: Brought her to the truck.
translation.it: la portò al pickup...

translation.en: Featherstone: Where were y'all at? Karl?
translation.it: E voi dove eravate, Karl?

translation.en: Right there by the gas pumps.
translation.it: Alle pompe di benzina.

translation.en: [Johnny] He was just someone that pretty much stayed to hisself,
translation.it: Era uno che stava molto per fatti suoi,

translation.en: even though he was not a violent guy or anything like that.
translation.it: anche se non era un violento, o niente del genere.

translation.en: He just pretty much stayed to hisself, and then...
translation.it: Se ne stava molto per conto suo,

translation.en: when his mom got killed, I believe he seen his mom get killed,
translation.it: poi sua madre fu uccisa, e se non sbaglio lui vide tutto,

translation.en: he-- he just kinda really stayed more to hisself.
translation.it: e questo lo fece chiudere ancora di più in se stesso.

translation.en: He, uh...
translation.it: Non aspirava a lavorare,

translation.en: He had pretty much no ambition to work, or really do anything.
translation.it: Non aspirava a lavorare, né a fare nulla.

translation.en: [Robert] Karl's father used to beat Karl when he was a little boy,
translation.it: Da piccolo, il padre di Karl lo picchiava.

translation.en: and they had dogs and cats and sheep
translation.it: Avevano cani, gatti, pecore...

translation.en: and whatever else you can think of out there in that little yard.
translation.it: C'era di tutto in quella specie di cortile.

translation.en: And Karl's father...
translation.it: E il padre di Karl,

translation.en: would...
translation.it: faceva...

translation.en: have sex with animals...
translation.it: sesso con gli animali

translation.en: in front of Karl.
translation.it: davanti a Karl.

translation.en: -Featherstone: Was she scared? -She was scared.
translation.it: - Aveva paura? - Sì, aveva paura.

translation.en: -Featherstone: What was she saying? -She was hollering for help.
translation.it: Che cosa diceva? Gridava e chiedeva aiuto.

translation.en: And then there was nobody around for to help.
translation.it: Ma non c'era nessuno che l'aiutasse.

translation.en: [man] I didn't know anything about Karl Fontenot
translation.it: Non sapevo niente su Karl Fontenot

translation.en: until I received a call
translation.it: finché non ricevetti una chiamata

translation.en: from, um, District Judge Ron Jones...
translation.it: del Giudice Distrettuale Ron Jones

translation.en: asking if I would accept a court appointment
translation.it: che mi chiese se accettavo un incarico d'ufficio

translation.en: to represent Mr. Fontenot.
translation.it: per difendere il signor Fontenot.

translation.en: And I thought he was competent in, in all respects.
translation.it: Pensai che fosse nel pieno possesso delle facoltà mentali.

translation.en: The real problem with that was the confession tapes.
translation.it: Il problema erano i filmati della confessione.

translation.en: They were in bold color...
translation.it: Dicevano a chiare lettere...

translation.en: and, and, and basically were...
translation.it: In pratica dicevano...

translation.en: just came across really somewhat...
translation.it: Insomma erano in un certo senso...

translation.en: cold-blooded, matter-of-factly, emotionless...
translation.it: spietati, fattuali, privi di emozioni.

translation.en: Featherstone: So... Odell Titsworth crawled up inside the pickup.
translation.it: Quindi Odell Titsworth salì sul pickup.

translation.en: Fontenot: Yes.
translation.it: Sì.

translation.en: Did he have something in his hand?
translation.it: Aveva qualcosa in mano?

translation.en: -Had his knife. -Featherstone: Was it open?
translation.it: - Il suo coltello. - Era aperto?

translation.en: Yes, it was open. And he... he was attempting to stab her.
translation.it: Sì , aperto. E cercò di accoltellarla.

translation.en: -And... -Featherstone: Did you see him stab her?
translation.it: - E... - Lo hai visto farlo?

translation.en: -He was stabbing her. -Featherstone: How did he do it?
translation.it: La accoltellava. In che modo?

translation.en: -He had the knife in his hand, like this. -All right.
translation.it: - Teneva il coltello in mano, così. - Ok.

translation.en: And he was... stabbing.
translation.it: E accoltellava.

translation.en: -Featherstone: Hard? -Yes.
translation.it: - Con forza? - Sì.

translation.en: How hard?
translation.it: Quanta forza?

translation.en: -Show me how hard. -Enough to get the full blade in.
translation.it: - Fammi vedere. - La lama entrava dentro.

translation.en: Like that.
translation.it: Così.

translation.en: Featherstone: Where was the first place that she was cut with the knife?
translation.it: Qual è stato il primo punto in cui l'ha accoltellata?

translation.en: In her side. Right here in the side, that's where Titsworth cut her.
translation.it: Il fianco, qui sul fianco. Titsworth l'ha tagliata qui.

translation.en: When he started to rape her, he goes,
translation.it: Quando ha iniziato a violentarla

translation.en: "If you don't cooperate with me and everything,"
translation.it: le ha detto che se non avesse collaborato

translation.en: he says, "I'll cut you deeper."
translation.it: sarebbe andato più a fondo.

translation.en: After that, me and Odell stood there and holded her while Tommy raped her.
translation.it: Poi, io e Odell la tenevamo ferma mentre Tom la violentava.

translation.en: Okay.
translation.it: Ok.

translation.en: She had tremendous cuts all over her body, all in her sides and on her legs.
translation.it: Aveva dei tagli orribili su tutto il corpo, sui fianchi e sulle gambe.

translation.en: -Featherstone: Were they deep cuts? -And on the side of her neck.
translation.it: Erano tagli profondi? Sul collo.

translation.en: Yeah, the ones in her stomach was.
translation.it: E anche nella pancia.

translation.en: -How could you tell they were deep cuts? -I could see her ribs and her insides.
translation.it: - Come facevi a sapere che erano profondi? - Vedevo le costole e le budella.

translation.en: Featherstone: Was she saying anything?
translation.it: Diceva qualcosa?

translation.en: She was hollering for help and telling us to stop.
translation.it: Gridava aiuto e ci chiedeva di smettere.

translation.en: Featherstone: Do you believe that she died
translation.it: Pensi che possa essere morta

translation.en: due to any other reason, other than the stab wounds?
translation.it: per ragioni diverse dalle ferite da coltello?

translation.en: No, that's what she died of, the stab wounds.
translation.it: No, è morta per quelle ferite da coltello.

translation.en: Featherstone: How many times did you cut her with the knife, Tommy?
translation.it: Quante volte l'hai tagliata col coltello, Tommy?

translation.en: Twice. Once upon her side and once down her arm.
translation.it: Due. Una sul fianco e una sul braccio.

translation.en: Featherstone: What do you mean, you had her "under control"?
translation.it: Che vuol dire che la tenevate "sotto controllo"?

translation.en: Well, she was more or less giving up.
translation.it: Si stava praticamente arrendendo.

translation.en: Okay.
translation.it: Ok.

translation.en: At the end.
translation.it: Alla fine.

translation.en: Featherstone: Try and beg y'all not to hurt her or...?
translation.it: Vi supplicava di non farle del male?

translation.en: She goes, "Tommy, I didn't think you'd ever do anything like this."
translation.it: Disse: "Tommy, non pensavo avresti mai fatto niente del genere".

translation.en: [Johnny] I'd been in and out enough, couple of times, that I was in that bullpen with Karl.
translation.it: Sono entrato e uscito diverse volte, e una volta mi ritrovai in cella con Karl.

translation.en: He sat next to me in that jailhouse and said... [sighs]
translation.it: Mi stava seduto vicino in quel carcere e mi disse:

translation.en: "I'm glad they're locking me up because I don't have to worry
translation.it: "Sono contento di andare dentro così non devo preoccuparmi

translation.en: about a place to sleep or where I'm going to get my next meal."
translation.it: di dove dormire o cosa mangiare".

translation.en: And that's exactly what he said.
translation.it: Disse esattamente così.

translation.en: Featherstone: Karl?
translation.it: Karl?

translation.en: During the period of time that we've interviewed you, today...
translation.it: Nel lasso di tempo in cui ti abbiamo interrogato oggi,

translation.en: Once again, I'd like to ask you, have we threatened you or...
translation.it: vorrei chiederti di nuovo se pensi che ti abbiamo minacciato o...

translation.en: -No. -...promised you anything?
translation.it: -No. -...promesso qualcosa?

translation.en: You're making this of your own free will, this statement?
translation.it: Hai rilasciato questa dichiarazione per tua volontà.

translation.en: It was of my own free will to get this recorded.
translation.it: Ho registrato questa dichiarazione per mia volontà.

translation.en: Have you been allowed to smoke, drink,
translation.it: Ti è stato permesso di fumare, bere,

translation.en: -drink Cokes... -Yes.
translation.it: - bere Coca... -Sì.

translation.en: ...anything that you wanted?
translation.it: E qualsiasi cosa volessi?

translation.en: Yes, I was served right during the meeting.
translation.it: Sì, sono stato trattato bene durante l'incontro.

translation.en: Once again, Tommy, I want to reiterate,
translation.it: Tommy, ti ricordo ancora una volta

translation.en: you're giving this statement of your own free will?
translation.it: che questa tua dichiarazione è stata spontanea.

translation.en: Yes, sir.
translation.it: Sì, signore.

translation.en: Is there anything else that you'd like to add, to this tape recording,
translation.it: C'è nient'altro che vorresti aggiungere a questa registrazione

translation.en: prior to us shutting it off?
translation.it: prima di concludere?

translation.en: I knew, if...
translation.it: Sapevo...

translation.en: I knew I wouldn't have done it if I wasn't drunk,
translation.it: Non lo avrei mai fatto da sobrio.

translation.en: 'cause I thought it was just a dream.
translation.it: Mi sembrava tutto un sogno.

translation.en: So immediately, and this was in-- And this was like...
translation.it: Subito, saranno state...

translation.en: around midnight, or whenever they were questioned.
translation.it: Forse era mezzanotte o giù di lì...

translation.en: So, then they tell them, "You're under arrest for kidnapping, rape, and murder."
translation.it: Li arrestarono per rapimento, stupro e omicidio.

translation.en: And then they called the headquarters in Ada.
translation.it: Chiamarono la sede di Ada.

translation.en: They sent cops to Odell Titsworth's house.
translation.it: Mandarono dei poliziotti a casa di Odell Titsworth.

translation.en: They knew him from various... run-ins with the law.
translation.it: Lo conoscevano, aveva già avuto guai con la legge.

translation.en: [Robert] They get to Odell Titsworth's house and he's there with his mother
translation.it: Arrivarono a casa di Odell Titsworth, lo trovarono lì con la madre,

translation.en: and they accuse him.
translation.it: e lo accusarono.

translation.en: Anyway, the mother says,
translation.it: La madre disse:

translation.en: "Odell couldn't have done that.
translation.it: "Odell non può essere stato.

translation.en: He was home with a broken arm that the police broke two nights before."
translation.it: Era a casa con un braccio rotto che gli ha rotto la polizia due notti prima".

translation.en: So the cops are thinking, "That the police broke? What are you talking about?"
translation.it: E i poliziotti pensarono? "La polizia? Di che parla?"

translation.en: [Robert] So that's what their description
translation.it: E quella era la descrizione di cosa stesse facendo Odell

translation.en: of what Odell was doing the night of the crime.
translation.it: E quella era la descrizione di cosa stesse facendo Odell la notte dell'omicidio.

translation.en: Well, that's easy enough to prove.
translation.it: Facile da provare.

translation.en: And so the police officers,
translation.it: Così gli agenti

translation.en: they go down to the hospital, and they keep records.
translation.it: andarono all'ospedale e controllarono i referti.

translation.en: And sure enough, on that date, Odell Titsworth had been treated
translation.it: E senza ombra di dubbio quel giorno Odell Titsworth era stato lì

translation.en: and he had a broken arm,
translation.it: per una frattura al braccio,

translation.en: the humerus, which is up here.
translation.it: all'omero, che è quassù.

translation.en: And was told that he's even going to have to sleep in a chair
translation.it: Gli avevano prescritto di dormire su una sedia

translation.en: for like a month or so.
translation.it: per un mese o giù di lì.

translation.en: So the mother and Odell were not lying. There was proof,
translation.it: Così, Odell e la madre non mentivano. C'erano prove

translation.en: in the police department itself, that he was in no condition
translation.it: anche alla polizia stessa che non era in condizioni

translation.en: that night to lift bodies over fences and so forth.
translation.it: quella notte di sollevare un cadavere o cose del genere.

translation.en: Now they've got a problem. It's on the confession tape.
translation.it: Avevano un problema: il filmato della confessione.

translation.en: It's a big thing, a part of the tape, like, Odell was the leader,
translation.it: Nel filmato sembra che Odell fosse il capo,

translation.en: that he was at home with a broken arm that night.
translation.it: mentre era a casa con un braccio rotto.

translation.en: [woman] I was actually still in school,
translation.it: Stavo ancora studiando,

translation.en: but I was a radio newscaster at the time.
translation.it: ma all'epoca facevo la conduttrice radiofonica.

translation.en: And we had the only radio news team
translation.it: Allora eravamo l'unica squadra di giornalisti radiofonici

translation.en: in the city, at the time.
translation.it: in città.

translation.en: And so we covered all of the trials and any of the big news going on there.
translation.it: E ci occupavamo di tutti i processi e tutto quello che succedeva.

translation.en: I know that there were several unsolved murders of women at the time.
translation.it: So che c'erano diversi casi irrisolti con protagoniste delle donne.

translation.en: The Deborah Carter case was unsolved.
translation.it: Il caso Deborah Carter era irrisolto.

translation.en: And, um, there was a lot of public pressure being put
translation.it: C'era una grande pressione dell'opinione pubblica

translation.en: on the police department, the District Attorney's office
translation.it: sulla polizia e sull'Ufficio del Procuratore Distrettuale

translation.en: to make sure that these were solved.
translation.it: per garantirne le risoluzione.

translation.en: Dennis Smith told me one time, and actually it was Labor Day.
translation.it: Dennis Smith mi disse, era la Festa del Lavoro...

translation.en: Uh, we were sitting right in front of the courthouse and Dennis told me
translation.it: Eravamo di fronte al tribunale, e Dennis mi disse

translation.en: that, uh, he asked his wife,
translation.it: che aveva chiesto alla moglie che cosa volesse fare quel giorno.

translation.en: "What do you want to do today?" They both had the day off.
translation.it: che aveva chiesto alla moglie che cosa volesse fare quel giorno. Erano liberi entrambi.

translation.en: And she said...
translation.it: E lei aveva risposto:

translation.en: "Let's-- Let's go look for Denice Haraway's body."
translation.it: "Andiamo a cercare il corpo di Denice Haraway".

translation.en: And this was, again, three months later.
translation.it: Erano passati tre mesi.

translation.en: That's how this town was, was gripped by this thing.
translation.it: La città era totalmente assorbita dalla cosa.

translation.en: The authorities never found Denice Haraway's body
translation.it: Le autorità non hanno mai trovato il corpo di Denice Haraway

translation.en: in the Ward and Fontenot case.
translation.it: nel caso Ward e Fontenot.

translation.en: [Robert] I always thought...
translation.it: Ho sempre pensato che...

translation.en: that for a murder charge you had to have the body.
translation.it: per un'accusa di omicidio servisse il corpo.

translation.en: And Bill Peterson explained to me, and of course he was dead on right,
translation.it: Bill Peterson mi spiegò, e aveva ragione da vendere,

translation.en: that corpus delicti means "the body of the crime."
translation.it: che corpus delicti significa "il corpo del delitto".

translation.en: If that was not the law, then anybody who was good at hiding a body
translation.it: Se non fosse stato così, chiunque sia bravo a nascondere un corpo

translation.en: could get away with murder.
translation.it: può scampare all'accusa di omicidio.

translation.en: And that's why you don't-- they don't have to produce the body,
translation.it: Per questo  non importa che ci sia il corpo,

translation.en: just evidence that a crime was committed.
translation.it: ma solo prove che il delitto sia stato commesso.

translation.en: But it doesn't have to be the body.
translation.it: Non necessariamente un cadavere.

translation.en: [Judge] The prosecution has to prove that nobody's seen her here.
translation.it: L'accusa deve provare che nessuno l'ha più vista,

translation.en: Nobody's seen her at church. Nobody saw her at school.
translation.it: né in chiesa, né a scuola.

translation.en: Nobody saw her at home, etc.
translation.it: né a casa, eccetera.

translation.en: It is very rare.
translation.it: Accade molto raramente.

translation.en: I only know of maybe
translation.it: Conosco forse

translation.en: three cases where that's been done.
translation.it: tre casi di questo tipo.

translation.en: [Robert] The date for the trial had been set.
translation.it: La data del processo era stata fissata.

translation.en: So they were tried for robbery,
translation.it: Furono giudicati per rapina,

translation.en: kidnapping, and murder.
translation.it: rapimento e omicidio.

translation.en: The atmosphere was tense.
translation.it: L'atmosfera era tesa.

translation.en: Some members of the Haraway family sat in.
translation.it: Testimoniarono dei membri della famiglia Haraway.

translation.en: Some members of Tommy Ward's family sat in on the trial.
translation.it: Testimoniarono dei membri della famiglia di Tommy Ward.

translation.en: I was waiting for Denice Haraway to walk back through the door.
translation.it: Mi aspettavo che Denice Haraway entrasse da quella porta.

translation.en: -Yeah. -I honestly was.
translation.it: - Sì. - Lo speravo.

translation.en: At the trial, just walk in.
translation.it: Che entrasse al processo.

translation.en: -I honestly was. -But never happened.
translation.it: - Lo speravo davvero. - Non successe.

translation.en: Never happened.
translation.it: Non successe.

translation.en: Both Don Wyatt, who represented Tommy Ward, and I...
translation.it: Sia Don Wyatt, che difendeva Tommy Ward, che io,

translation.en: knew that we were facing uphill battles
translation.it: sapevamo che la strada era in salita... CORPUS DELECTI

translation.en: because there was no body.
translation.it: ...perché non c'era un cadavere.

translation.en: [Dan] Bill Peterson was the main prosecutor. He had... Chris Ross was helping with his case.
translation.it: Bill Peterson era il procuratore, mentre Chris Ross aiutava col caso.

translation.en: Chris was a very effective attorney. Very smart. Could think on his feet.
translation.it: ASSISTENTE PROCURATORE Chris era un bravo procuratore. Scaltro, prendeva decisioni all'istante.

translation.en: [Robert] The prosecution, as is normal in such cases, went first.
translation.it: Cominciò l'accusa, come è normale in casi del genere.

translation.en: And Bill Peterson has a mindset of presenting a story.
translation.it: Bill Peterson ebbe l'approccio di chi vuole presentare una storia.

translation.en: So he started with the fellow who came and found...
translation.it: Cominciò con il tizio che aveva visto

translation.en: you know, who saw the couple walking out and thought they were lovers,
translation.it: le persone uscire dal minimarket credendo fossero una coppietta

translation.en: and then went in and found that she was missing.
translation.it: per poi andare dentro e scoprire che era scomparsa.

translation.en: Like I said, I saw her periodically.
translation.it: Come dicevo, non la vedevo spesso.

translation.en: I didn't recognize her when she came out.
translation.it: Non la riconobbi quando la vidi uscire.

translation.en: But after I got in the store and nobody was there, I said,
translation.it: Ma dopo essere entrato e lei non c'era pensai:

translation.en: "That girl that just left is the girl that works here."
translation.it: "Quella che è appena uscita è la ragazza che lavora qui".

translation.en: I told my nephews that.
translation.it: Lo dissi ai miei nipoti.

translation.en: No, I know.
translation.it: Lo so.

translation.en: There's no doubt in my mind that she was taken.
translation.it: Non ho alcun dubbio che l'abbiano portata via.

translation.en: As we arrived.
translation.it: Quando arrivammo.

translation.en: [Robert] They called Karen Wise.
translation.it: Chiamarono Karen Wise alla sbarra,

translation.en: The girl who worked up the road at J.P.'s Pack-To-Go.
translation.it: la ragazza che lavorava al J.P.'s Pack-To-Go

translation.en: [Robert] And asked if those were the two people who were messing around in her store.
translation.it: e le chiesero se quei due erano le persone che l'avevano infastidita.

translation.en: And she said, "Without a doubt."
translation.it: E disse: "Senza alcun dubbio".

translation.en: She testified that one of them was Tommy Ward.
translation.it: Lei testimoniò che uno di loro era Tommy Ward.

translation.en: There's a, uh, woman that testified, called by the prosecutors,
translation.it: Poi l'accusa chiamò a testimoniare una donna

translation.en: that she had been in the jail for several weeks
translation.it: che disse che era stata per diverse settimane nel carcere

translation.en: at the same time that Tommy and Karl were there,
translation.it: dove si trovavano Tommy e Karl

translation.en: before the trial.
translation.it: prima del processo.

translation.en: And she testified
translation.it: E testimoniò

translation.en: that she overheard Karl confessing to the crime,
translation.it: che aveva sentito Karl confessare il delitto

translation.en: how they had killed the girl.
translation.it: e raccontare l'omicidio. TERRI HOLLAND TESTIMONE

translation.en: "Question: 'Would you tell this jury what he said?'
translation.it: "Domanda: Può riferire alla giuria cosa diceva?

translation.en: Answer: 'He said that Odell raped her first
translation.it: Risposta: Diceva che Odell l'aveva violentata per primo

translation.en: and then it was Tommy's turn.
translation.it: e poi era toccato a Tommy'.

translation.en: He bit her on the breast and cut her down the arm.
translation.it: Le aveva morso il seno e tagliato il braccio

translation.en: And Odell killed her, stabbed her to death and killed her.
translation.it: e poi Odell l'aveva accoltellata a morte.

translation.en: And then Karl raped her.'
translation.it: E Karl l'aveva stuprata.

translation.en: Question: 'When he told you this statement Terri, what was your reaction to that?'
translation.it: Domanda: Quando le disse queste cose lei come reagì?

translation.en: Answer: 'He scared me.'"
translation.it: Risposta: Mi fece paura".

translation.en: And then, for the denouement,
translation.it: E quindi, a conclusione del tutto,

translation.en: the final piece of testimony, of evidence,
translation.it: l'ultima testimonianza e prova

translation.en: they played the confession.
translation.it: furono i filmati della confessione.

translation.en: Featherstone: You said earlier that you noticed, when you came back up,
translation.it: Prima hai detto che quando tornasti indietro

translation.en: a large amount of blood.
translation.it: c'era tantissimo sangue.

translation.en: Where all was she bleeding from?
translation.it: Da dove usciva il sangue?

translation.en: Mostly in her side.
translation.it: Soprattutto dal fianco.

translation.en: Where the deep cut was.
translation.it: Dal taglio profondo.

translation.en: -Featherstone: And where else? -In the side of her neck, right here.
translation.it: E da dove altro? Su un lato del collo, qui.

translation.en: [Butner] There was only one leader of this two-person church,
translation.it: C'era un solo leader di questa "confraternita" di due persone,

translation.en: and that was Tommy.
translation.it: e quello era Tommy.

translation.en: I think that Karl's relationship with Tommy was that
translation.it: Credo che il rapporto di Karl con Tommy,

translation.en: if Tommy Ward had anything to do with that crime,
translation.it: era che se Tommy Ward aveva qualcosa a che fare col caso,

translation.en: Karl would have been there handing him what he needed.
translation.it: Karl era quello che gli passava gli strumenti che gli servivano.

translation.en: -Featherstone: Was she conscious then? -No. She wasn't very lively at all.
translation.it: - Era cosciente allora? - No. Non era molto attiva.

translation.en: -How come? -Because we'd all three raped her.
translation.it: - Perché? - Perché l'avevamo stuprata in tre.

translation.en: I knew that she was dead because she was white.
translation.it: Sapevo che era morta perché era... bianca.

translation.en: We had to get rid of her and all,
translation.it: Dovevamo sbarazzarci di lei,

translation.en: and he asked me a good place to get rid of her.
translation.it: e mi chiese se conoscevo un posto adatto.

translation.en: And I told him about a house, and about this ditch down by the...
translation.it: Allora gli dissi di una casa e di un fosso vicino al...

translation.en: Sandy River.
translation.it: ...fiume Sandy.

translation.en: And then he put her off in the rotten place in the floor.
translation.it: Così lui la mise giù dove il pavimento era marcito,

translation.en: -Where was that? -Over where the floor was missing.
translation.it: dove mancava il pavimento.

translation.en: [Robert] Once the tapes were played,
translation.it: Dopo la proiezione dei filmati,

translation.en: uh, the audience was--
translation.it: il pubblico,

translation.en: the spectators in the room...
translation.it: gli spettatori in aula,

translation.en: they were horrified. And once people saw that...
translation.it: erano sconvolti. E la gente cominciò a pensarlo.

translation.en: these people were guilty. How can anybody even say
translation.it: Erano colpevoli. Come fai anche solo

translation.en: they did things like that?
translation.it: a dirle cose del genere?

translation.en: -Featherstone: You poured gasoline on her? -Yes.
translation.it: - Le avete versato la benzina addosso? - Sì.

translation.en: And then what? What did you do after you poured the gas on her?
translation.it: E poi che avete fatto dopo averla ricoperta di benzina?

translation.en: We lit the house.
translation.it: Abbiamo dato fuoco alla casa.

translation.en: We lit the gas and burnt the house and her.
translation.it: Abbiamo dato fuoco alla casa e al cadavere.

translation.en: [Dawn] That was the first murder trial that I had done
translation.it: È stato il mio primo caso di omicidio,

translation.en: and it lasted two and a half weeks.
translation.it: e durò due settimane e mezzo.

translation.en: And, um...
I went home at the end of it every day and cried.
translation.it: Ogni sera tornavo a casa e piangevo.

translation.en: [Dawn] Every day, hearing bad things...
translation.it: Tutti i giorni ad ascoltare fatti orribili,

translation.en: and so much of it.
translation.it: e così tanti.

translation.en: And I believed, I believed the evidence.
translation.it: Io ci credevo, credevo alle prove.

translation.en: I think in these particular cases,
translation.it: Per questi casi in particolare,

translation.en: Mr. Peterson and Mr. Ross were the prosecutors.
translation.it: Peterson e Ross, i procuratori,

translation.en: It's like they're telling a story and a story unfolding, and, um...
translation.it: raccontavano una storia che prendeva corpo davanti a me.

translation.en: for sure, Mr. Ross is a very good...
translation.it: Senz'altro Ross è molto bravo...

translation.en: very good at his job.
translation.it: a fare il suo lavoro.

translation.en: [Robert] When Chris Ross began his closing arguments,
translation.it: Quando Chris Ross cominciò la sua arringa finale,

translation.en: he used psychiatry as a way of explaining...
translation.it: usò la psichiatria per spiegare

translation.en: for where the third person came from in the, uh, confession tapes.
translation.it: da dove venisse la terza persona dei filmati della confessione.

translation.en: [Robert] "I submit, ladies and gentlemen...
translation.it: "Vi sottopongo, signore e signori..."

translation.en: everything Mr. Ward did in his confession,
translation.it: ARRINGA FINALE DI CHRIS ROSS "...tutto ciò che il signor Ward ha dichiarato nella confessione,

translation.en: things he did in reality,
translation.it: cose che ha davvero fatto,

translation.en: he blamed on Odell Titsworth.
translation.it: e per cui ha accusato Odell Titsworth.

translation.en: You'll notice that Odell and Tommy Ward
translation.it: Avrete notato che Odell e Tommy Ward

translation.en: never did one single, significant thing together.
translation.it: non hanno mai fatto nulla insieme.

translation.en: I submit, ladies and gentlemen,
translation.it: Vi sottopongo, signore e signori,

translation.en: everything Mr. Ward did in his confession.
translation.it: tutto ciò che il signor Ward ha confessato,

translation.en: He sees himself doing it and then he says that Odell did it.
translation.it: con lui che commetteva il reato, ma accusava Odell di averlo commesso.

translation.en: And this is confusing, but ladies and gentlemen, when he's doing this,
translation.it: So che questo può confondere, ma mentre lo fa,

translation.en: and he recounts what happened, and he sees it in his mind.
translation.it: e racconta quello che è accaduto, nella sua mente lui lo vede.

translation.en: He sees himself doing something...
translation.it: Vede se stesso compiere gesti

translation.en: that he tells himself he would never do.
translation.it: che poi dice a se stesso che non farebbe mai.

translation.en: He says Odell did that.
translation.it: E accusa Odell.

translation.en: I submit to you, Odell Titsworth was Tommy Ward
translation.it: Vi sottopongo che Odell Titsworth era Tommy Ward,

translation.en: and he raped her first, and then Karl raped her.
translation.it: che l'ha stuprata per primo, seguito da Karl.

translation.en: And one of these two men killed Denice Haraway.
translation.it: Uno di questi due uomini ha ucciso Denice Haraway.

translation.en: One of these two men stabbed her to death.
translation.it: Uno di questi due uomini l'ha accoltellata a morte.

translation.en: I submit to you, ladies and gentlemen, that man was Tommy Ward."
translation.it: Vi sottopongo, signore e signori, che quell'uomo era Tommy Ward."

translation.en: [Butner] Chris took the confessions
translation.it: Chris prese la confessione,

translation.en: and wove a closing argument and presented it,
translation.it: ci costruì intorno un'arringa finale, la presentò,

translation.en: and the jury bought it.
translation.it: e la giuria ci credette.

translation.en: And that's what I think was the final nail
translation.it: E quello fu l'ultimo chiodo

translation.en: in that coffin of conviction.
translation.it: nella bara della condanna.

translation.en: The judge goes down all the jurors' votes.
translation.it: Il giudice lesse tutti i voti della giuria.

translation.en: And it was 12 to nothing on all counts.
translation.it: Erano 12 a zero per tutti i capi d'accusa.

translation.en: Featherstone: Are you confused about any of this today
translation.it: C'è qualcosa che ti confonde oggi

translation.en: or do you understand what's going on?
translation.it: o capisci di che si tratta?

translation.en: -Yes, I understand what's going on. -Okay.
translation.it: - Sì, capisco di cosa si tratta. - Ok.

translation.en: You understand how serious this investigation is?
translation.it: Sei consapevole della gravità di questo caso?

translation.en: -Yes, I do. -Okay.
translation.it: -Sì. -Ok.

translation.en: We'll end the tape at this time.
translation.it: Interrompiamo il filmato qui.

translation.en: I've got 7:29 p.m.
translation.it: Sono le 19:29

translation.en: And we'll conclude the tape now.
translation.it: e la registrazione finisce ora.

translation.en: Still present in the room...
translation.it: Ancora presenti in aula

translation.en: Deputy Inspector Rusty Featherstone, Special Agent Gary Rogers,
translation.it: vice-ispettore Rusty Featherstone, agente speciale Gary Rogers,

translation.en: Captain Dennis Smith, and Agent Dee Cordray,
translation.it: capitano Dennis Smith, e agente Dee Cordray,

translation.en: as well as Tommy Ward.
translation.it: insieme a Tommy Ward.

translation.en: ♪ While I run this race ♪ ♪ Oh, Lord, hold my hand ♪
translation.it: PENITENZIARIO DI STATO DELL'OKLAHOMA, 2017

translation.en: My name is Thomas Ward.
translation.it: Mi chiamo Thomas Ward.

translation.en: I've been in prison for the last 33 years for a crime I did not commit.
translation.it: Sono in carcere da 33 anni per un reato che non ho commesso.

translation.en: ♪ Oh, Lord, guide my mind While I run this race ♪
translation.it: Sottotitoli: Rachele Agnusdei
